main event: Several unidentified objects were tracked via ground radar, confirmed by visual observation, displaying rapid and erratic maneuvers.
interesting points: Objects appeared to be the size of a man's fist held at arm's length., The observation lasted for about 2 hours., The objects were initially detected by radar before being visually confirmed., Witnesses reported the objects exhibited erratic movement not typical of planets., The witness claimed to have repeated sightings during the period.
witness description: Witnesses included a retired U.S. Air Force Master Sergeant and other officers.
